```{r}
library(tidyverse)

golf_data <- read_csv(file = "dg_course_table.csv")
```

```{r}
golf_data |> ggplot(mapping = aes(x = adj_score_to_par, y = yardage)) + geom_point() + geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE, color = "green") + labs(title = "Relation between yardage of PGA course and score", subtitle = "Yardage has a slight effect on the score.", x = "Score to Par", y = "Yardage ", caption = "Data from datagolf.com") + theme(plot.title = element_text(face = "bold")) 
```
